p: Hibiscus noldeae ( H. noldeae) has been studied by virtue of its attribute as one of the medicinal plants used by the traditional healers in Rwanda to manufacture their remedies. In the context of asthma treatment, the recipe, containing 7 different plants, that revealed the best anti-inflammatory activity [ 21] comprised H. noldeae in major proportion (35%). We therefore hypothesized that this medicinal plant may harbor the therapeutic constituents.
